title: Christian Rodrigo Zurita
text:
Christian Rodrigo Zurita (born July 24, 1979 in <a href="Salta">Salta</a>) is an <a href="Argentina">Argentine</a> <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="midfielder%20%28football%29">midfielder</a>. He currently plays as captain for <a href="Mersin%20%C4%B0dman%20Yurdu">Mersin İdman Yurdu</a> of the <a href="Turkish%20Super%20League">Spor Toto Super League</a> in <a href="Turkey">Turkey</a>.
Zurita started his career at his local club <a href="Gimnasia%20y%20Tiro%20de%20Salta">Gimnasia y Tiro de Salta</a> in the <a href="Primera%20Division%20Argentina">Primera Division Argentina</a> in 1997, at the end of the 1997–1998 season the club were relegated to the <a href="Primera%20B%20Nacional">Argentine 2nd division</a> and Zurita decided to stay with the club.
When Gimnasia y Tiro failed to secure promotion back to the primera, Zurita moved to <a href="Club%20Atl%C3%A9tico%20San%20Lorenzo%20de%20Almagro">San Lorenzo</a>, the club with which he has had the most success to date.
In 2003 Zurita was sold to <a href="Club%20Atl%C3%A9tico%20Independiente">Club Atlético Independiente</a> and 2 seasons later he joined <a href="Col%C3%B3n%20de%20Santa%20Fe">Colón de Santa Fe</a> and during the summer of 2006 Zurita joined Gaziantepspor in Turkey and in 2009 he became the team captain.
